verses.verse: לְדָוִ֨ד ׀ <S%H1732><s%> [A Psalm] of David בָּרֲכִ֣י <S%H1288><s%> Bless נַ֭פְשִׁי <S%H5315><s%> O my soul אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all קְ֝רָבַ֗י <S%H7130><s%> and all that is within אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שֵׁ֥ם <S%H8034><s%> name קָדְשֽׁוֹ׃ <S%H6944><s%> me [bless] his holy

בָּרֲכִ֣י <S%H1288><s%> Bless נַ֭פְשִׁי <S%H5315><s%> O my soul אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD וְאַל־ <S%H408><s%> nay תִּ֝שְׁכְּחִ֗י <S%H7911><s%> and forget כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all manner גְּמוּלָֽיו׃ <S%H1576><s%> not all his benefits

הַסֹּלֵ֥חַ <S%H5545><s%> Who forgiveth לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all עֲוֹנֵ֑כִי <S%H5771><s%> all thine iniquities הָ֝רֹפֵ֗א <S%H7495><s%> who healeth לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all תַּחֲלֻאָֽיְכִי׃ <S%H8463><s%> all thy diseases

הַגּוֹאֵ֣ל <S%H1350><s%> Who redeemeth מִשַּׁ֣חַת <S%H7845><s%> from destruction חַיָּ֑יְכִי <S%H2416><s%> thy life הַֽ֝מְעַטְּרֵ֗כִי <S%H5849><s%> who crowneth חֶ֣סֶד <S%H2617><s%> thee with lovingkindness וְרַחֲמִֽים׃ <S%H7356><s%> and tender mercies

הַמַּשְׂבִּ֣יַע <S%H7646><s%> Who satisfieth בַּטּ֣וֹב <S%H2896><s%> with good עֶדְיֵ֑ךְ <S%H5716><s%> thy mouth תִּתְחַדֵּ֖שׁ <S%H2318><s%> is renewed כַּנֶּ֣שֶׁר <S%H5404><s%> like the eagle's נְעוּרָֽיְכִי׃ <S%H5271><s%> [things so that] thy youth

עֹשֵׂ֣ה <S%H6213><s%> executeth צְדָק֣וֹת <S%H6666><s%> righteousness יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> The LORD וּ֝מִשְׁפָּטִ֗ים <S%H4941><s%> and judgment לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> for all עֲשׁוּקִֽים׃ <S%H6231><s%> for all that are oppressed

יוֹדִ֣יעַ <S%H3045><s%> He made known דְּרָכָ֣יו <S%H1870><s%> his ways לְמֹשֶׁ֑ה <S%H4872><s%> unto Moses לִבְנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> unto the children יִ֝שְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel עֲלִילֽוֹתָיו׃ <S%H5949><s%> his acts

רַח֣וּם <S%H7349><s%> [is] merciful וְחַנּ֣וּן <S%H2587><s%> and gracious יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> The LORD אֶ֖רֶךְ <S%H750><s%> slow אַפַּ֣יִם <S%H639><s%> to anger וְרַב־ <S%H7227><s%> and plenteous חָֽסֶד׃ <S%H2617><s%> in mercy

לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> Nor לָנֶ֥צַח <S%H5331><s%> He will not always יָרִ֑יב <S%H7378><s%> chide וְלֹ֖א <S%H3808><s%> Nor לְעוֹלָ֣ם <S%H5769><s%> [his anger] for ever יִטּֽוֹר׃ <S%H5201><s%> neither will he keep

לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> Nor כַ֭חֲטָאֵינוּ <S%H2399><s%> with us after our sins עָ֣שָׂה <S%H6213><s%> He hath not dealt לָ֑נוּ וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> Nor כַ֝עֲוֹנֹתֵ֗ינוּ <S%H5771><s%> us according to our iniquities גָּמַ֥ל <S%H1580><s%> nor rewarded עָלֵֽינוּ׃ <S%H5921><s%> and

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> as כִגְבֹ֣הַּ <S%H1361><s%> is high above שָׁ֭מַיִם <S%H8064><s%> For as the heaven עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> are above הָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> the earth גָּבַ֥ר <S%H1396><s%> [so] great חַ֝סְדּ֗וֹ <S%H2617><s%> is his mercy עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> toward יְרֵאָֽיו׃ <S%H3373><s%> toward them that fear

כִּרְחֹ֣ק <S%H7368><s%> As far as מִ֭זְרָח <S%H4217><s%> the east מִֽמַּֽעֲרָ֑ב <S%H4628><s%> is from the west הִֽרְחִ֥יק <S%H7368><s%> [so] far hath he removed מִ֝מֶּ֗נּוּ <S%H4480><s%> at אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> פְּשָׁעֵֽינוּ׃ <S%H6588><s%> our transgressions

כְּרַחֵ֣ם <S%H7355><s%> pitieth אָ֭ב <S%H1><s%> Like as a father עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on בָּנִ֑ים <S%H1121><s%> [his] children רִחַ֥ם <S%H7355><s%> pitieth יְ֝הוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> [so] the LORD עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> that יְרֵאָֽיו׃ <S%H3373><s%> them that fear

כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> for ה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> Himself יָדַ֣ע <S%H3045><s%> For he knoweth יִצְרֵ֑נוּ <S%H3336><s%> our frame זָ֝כ֗וּר <S%H2142><s%> he remembereth כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> for עָפָ֥ר <S%H6083><s%> that we [are] dust אֲנָֽחְנוּ׃ <S%H587><s%> ourselves

אֱ֭נוֹשׁ <S%H376><s%> are like כֶּחָצִ֣יר <S%H2682><s%> [are] as grass יָמָ֑יו <S%H3117><s%> his days כְּצִ֥יץ <S%H6731><s%> as a flower הַ֝שָּׂדֶ֗ה <S%H7704><s%> of the field כֵּ֣ן <S%H3651><s%> so יָצִֽיץ׃ <S%H6692><s%> so he flourisheth

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> When ר֣וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> For the wind עָֽבְרָה־ <S%H5674><s%> passeth over בּ֣וֹ וְאֵינֶ֑נּוּ <S%H369><s%> is no וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> no יַכִּירֶ֖נּוּ <S%H5234><s%> thereof shall know ע֣וֹד <S%H5750><s%> longer מְקוֹמֽוֹ׃ <S%H4725><s%> it and it is gone and the place

וְחֶ֤סֶד <S%H2617><s%> But the mercy יְהוָ֨ה ׀ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD מֵעוֹלָ֣ם <S%H5769><s%> [is] from everlasting וְעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> to ע֭וֹלָם <S%H5769><s%> everlasting עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> upon יְרֵאָ֑יו <S%H3373><s%> upon them that fear וְ֝צִדְקָת֗וֹ <S%H6666><s%> him and his righteousness לִבְנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> unto children's בָנִֽים׃ <S%H1121><s%> children

לְשֹׁמְרֵ֥י <S%H8104><s%> To such as keep בְרִית֑וֹ <S%H1285><s%> his covenant וּלְזֹכְרֵ֥י <S%H2142><s%> and to those that remember פִ֝קֻּדָ֗יו <S%H6490><s%> his commandments לַעֲשׂוֹתָֽם׃ <S%H6213><s%> to do

יְֽהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> The LORD בַּ֭שָּׁמַיִם <S%H8064><s%> in the heavens הֵכִ֣ין <S%H3559><s%> hath prepared כִּסְא֑וֹ <S%H3678><s%> his throne וּ֝מַלְכוּת֗וֹ <S%H4438><s%> and his kingdom בַּכֹּ֥ל <S%H3605><s%> all מָשָֽׁלָה׃ <S%H4910><s%> ruleth

בָּרֲכ֥וּ <S%H1288><s%> Bless יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD מַלְאָ֫כָ֥יו <S%H4397><s%> ye his angels גִּבֹּ֣רֵי <S%H1368><s%> that excel כֹ֭חַ <S%H3581><s%> in strength עֹשֵׂ֣י <S%H6213><s%> that do דְבָר֑וֹ <S%H1697><s%> his commandments לִ֝שְׁמֹ֗עַ <S%H8085><s%> hearkening בְּק֣וֹל <S%H6963><s%> unto the voice דְּבָרֽוֹ׃ <S%H1697><s%> of his word

בָּרֲכ֣וּ <S%H1288><s%> Bless יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> ye the LORD כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all צְבָאָ֑יו <S%H6635><s%> all [ye] his hosts מְ֝שָׁרְתָ֗יו <S%H8334><s%> [ye] ministers עֹשֵׂ֥י <S%H6213><s%> of his that do רְצוֹנֽוֹ׃ <S%H7522><s%> his pleasure

בָּרֲכ֤וּ <S%H1288><s%> Bless יְהוָ֨ה ׀ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD כָּֽל־ <S%H3605><s%> all מַעֲשָׂ֗יו <S%H4639><s%> all his works בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all מְקֹמ֥וֹת <S%H4725><s%> in all places מֶמְשַׁלְתּ֑וֹ <S%H4475><s%> of his dominion בָּרֲכִ֥י <S%H1288><s%> bless נַ֝פְשִׁ֗י <S%H5315><s%> O my soul אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD
